children.remarks: The query may begin and/or end with * to add as a wildcard. No other wildcards are permitted in any other locations.
children.summary: Adds a simple filter which excludes a fully qualified class name.

children.summary: Gets the command-line arguments to pass to an xUnit.net v3 test assembly to perform the filtering contained within this filter.

summary: Represents the ability to track query filters or simple filters. Any attempt to add a mix of the two will result in an exception.
